metadata.title: CVE-2020-7955 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise 1.4.1 through 1.6.2 did notuniformly enforce ACLs across all API endpoints, resulting in potentialunintended information disclosure. Fixed in 1.6.3.

criterions.comment: consul: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
